mapper.select: (select p.* from BS_UserRoleRel ur right join BS_RolePermRel rp on ur.rid = rp.rid left join BS_Permission p on rp.pid = p.pid where ur.uid = #{uid, jdbcType=INTEGER}) union (select p.* from BS_UserPermRel up left join BS_Permission p on up.pid = p.pid where up.uid= #{uid, jdbcType=INTEGER})
